reference.title: SGSN support for enhanced RANAP reset handling (Feature f52064-01): feature summary
reference.shortdesc: This feature enhances SGSN behavior by sending RANAP Reset message to the RNCs at the initial CMM startup or when there is a total PAPS outage such as isolation and duplex IPDS failure. This is required when the links are activated on the SCTP/M3UA/SCCP level but the RNCs do not initiate the id-Reset.
